newInfo: Laser experiments have also shown no curvature across bodies of water for over 3 miles, where we should see 6ft of curvature

Laser experiments have proven that after 3 miles over a body of water, there is still no curvature. Also, using a high powered zoom, you can zoom into a ship that appeared to sail over the horizon, proving that there is again no curvature.

Laser experiments over 3 miles on bodies of water have proven no curvature, where there should 6 ft of curvature. Also Nasa images have been caught with large amounts of photoshop faking clouds and also having completely different sizes of continents.
